name: Rating
description: A rating is an evaluation on a numeric scale, such as 1 to 5 stars.
title: Rating

fields.name: ratingValue
fields.title: ratingValue
fields.description: The rating for the content.Usage guidelines:Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similiar Unicode symbols.Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.

fields.name: bestRating
fields.title: bestRating
fields.description: The highest value allowed in this rating system. If bestRating is omitted, 5 is assumed.

fields.name: author
fields.title: author
fields.description: The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.

fields.name: worstRating
fields.title: worstRating
fields.description: The lowest value allowed in this rating system. If worstRating is omitted, 1 is assumed.

fields.name: reviewAspect
fields.title: reviewAspect
fields.description: This Review or Rating is relevant to this part or facet of the itemReviewed.
